title: I Thought I Was Dying of Cancer
description:
Erin contends with drastic life changes after receiving a new diagnosis. - Dr. Laura: "Laughter could be your way forward." - Dr. Laura: "Laughter could be your way forward."

How did you adjust to unforeseeable health circumstances? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
